title: The Ring of Dawn Suite (Suite la bague d'aurore)
medium: Portfolio of twenty-four aquatints (including wrapper and variant print) (five with etching, two with engraving, two with drypoint, and one with pastel additions) and one etching
dimensions: composition (see child records): dimensions vary; sheet (orientation varies, each approx): 11 3/16 × 14 15/16" (28.4 × 38 cm) or 14 15/16 × 11 3/16" (38 × 28.4 cm)
credits: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Peter A. Rübel
